body.p:
Tho his Excellency Beriah Magoffin,
The Governor of Kentucky

A vacancy now exists in this, (Hays' Springs) District, for Magistrate or "Justice of the Peace" occasioned by the death of Isaac Mills; now we the undersigned pray your Excellency to fill said vacancy, and earnestly recommend our fellow citizen Oliver. C. Curry as every way qualified and worthy of said office

I, Jno. A. Hays J. P. J C. do hereby certify that Isaac Mills was my colleague as acting "Justice of the Peace" for this Hays' Springs" District for the County of Jefferson and state of Kentucky -- and that he has departed this life a

Jno. A. Hays J. P. J. C
Bland B. McReaig
J, H, Leatherman
S M Hobbs
Chas Hays
Jonathan McRoaig
Henry McReaig
Levi. Frederick

Deiming the above names sufficient I remain respectfully yours
Oliver. C. Curry

Hon. B. Magoffin
Gov. Kentucky
Nov 21st 1860
Richard Fryer
Tillotson Neel
Andrew. J. Miller
Peter W Hayes

Wm Thirston
Sampson Wigginton

M. W, Wakefield

Buford. Gentry

J. P.
Hays Spring Dist

vice
